title: India, Brazil agree to expand trade partnership; Piyush Goyal calls for stronger economic, agricultural ties
description: New Delhi: India and Brazil have agreed to explore ways to expand their existing Preferential Trade Agreement (PTA) as part of efforts to deepen bilateral economic and strategic ties. The agreement was reached during the India-Brazil Business Dialogue in New Delhi on Tuesday, which was attended by B...

title: US-Brazil trade tensions: Lula after meeting Trump at ASEAN summit says talks with US will begin ‘immediately’
description: US President Donald Trump and Brazilian President Luiz Inacio Lula da Silva met on Sunday (October 26) in Kuala Lumpur on the sidelines of the ASEAN Summit, signaling a potential thaw in relations after months of trade tensions. Lula described the meeting as “great” and said both countries’ negotiat...
